head.supplied: REGIA SOCIETAS SCIENTIARUM UPSALIENSIS, ¶ Die XXV mensis Novembris anni MDCCCLXXXVII, virum studio litterarum illustrem, praeclaris in scientias meritis inclytum Dominum Ferdinandum a Müller, horti bo...

div.p: From the Royal Society of Sciences of Uppsala
RB MSS M200b.55, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
Proofed. to translate.
MS is a printed certificate, with the signatures added by hand. REGIA SOCIETAS SCIENTIARUM UPSALIENSIS,

Die XXV mensis Novembris anni MDCCCLXXXVII, virum studio litterarum illustrem, praeclaris in scientias meritis inclytum Dominum Ferdinandum a Müller, horti botanici melbournensis directorem celeberrimum, sui collegii socium ordinarium esse decrevit,
The category of membership to which M was elected at this time was 'foreign member' (information provided by Professor H. Ellegren, Secretary, Royal Society of Sciences of Uppsala, 8 April 2020). He had previously been a corresponding member; see Royal Society of Sciences of Uppsala to M, 14 March 1862 (in this edition as 62-03-14a). quod patentibus hisce litteris testatum voluit.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Rob. Thalén Reg. Soc. a Secretis.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Royal Society of Sciences of Uppsala
